title: Day 6 - Learned about animations, chess, Angular and insurance
content:
• Today I completed the domino animation. I added colors and sound to it. I also started making another animation with the same concept but instead of a tower of cubes, I used large cuboids and to give the animation a domino effect.
  • Today I reached the rating of 896 in Blitz, 956 in Rapid, and 964 in Bullet. I discovered a platform called Decode Chess. It is an AI-powered app for chess improvement. Other chess engines only tell the best move in the position but Decode Chess tells why the move is the best. It is a good platform to analyze your games and learn from them.
  • I started learning angular from the YouTube channel CodeWithHarry. Today I completed the introduction part and faced some problems in the setup of the Angular environment. I did whatever I could but in the end, the solution was not to host the website on VSCode live server (port 5500) instead it should be hosted on http://localhost:4200/ and I learned that it is always useful to read the documentation.
  • I watched the third episode of Understanding Insurance and today I learned about health insurance and why it should be different for you and your parents. Today's topic was how to choose health insurance for your parents. I also learned about some important points to take into consideration like there should be no room rent capping and minimum waiting period.
author: Aarush Popli
